home_page.hero_subtitle: ka-chow! you’ll get an offr today
home_page.hero_message: The best years of your car longpassed? we will help send it to a better place.

steps.title: Describe your car
steps.text: Describe your car. Brand, year, model, mileage,and anything that points to its condition

steps.title: Fast
steps.text: You’ll get an insatnt offer from Scrabit. We’d love to buy your car at a  reasonable price

steps.title: Trusted
steps.text: Scrabit has helped over X drives sell their old cars  and found them a better propouse

steps.title: Convenient
steps.text: All you need is to share your car info, takethe offer, and watch your salvage car go

how_it_work_section.title: How it works
how_it_work_section.subtitle: ready to roll?
how_it_work_section.message: The best years of your car longpassed? we will help send it to a better place.

steps.title: Tell scrabit about your vehicle
steps.text: Whether a salvage car or barn find, we’re equally interested. share the info about your vehicle with Scrabit - no personal information is required before you take the offer

steps.title: view your offer
steps.text: You’re a few questions away from getting paid for your barn find. Scrabit takes your info, evaluates the market, and comes up with an instant offer for you

steps.title: Exchange your wheels for cash
steps.text: After the offer is accepted, we’ll arrange a pickup. Just a short examination of your car - and the money is yours to take!

review_section.author: Alexander Winebaum
review_section.text: The guy that came to pick up the car lied to me and said that the offer is being changed to 300 when the offer i accepted was 940 he proceded to tell that he actually works for a auction in san diego and that he could offer me more then the three hundred i reluctantly accepted then see that my offer was completed at the reduced amount on peddle by the original buyer so scammed
